<ns0:query>
 <ns0:queryString>
 SELECT
 Id, Name, ProductCode, Description
 FROM
 Product2
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: options.get('product_id', None) is not None">
 WHERE
 Id = '<tal:block tal:content="options/product_id" />'
 </tal:block>
 </ns0:queryString>
 </ns0:query>

<ns0:query>
 <ns0:queryString>
 SELECT
 Id, Name, ProductCode, Description
 FROM
 Product2
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: options.get('product_id', None) is not None">

 Id = '<tal:block tal:content="options/product_id" />'
 </tal:block>
 </ns0:queryString>
 </ns0:query>
args = [], kw = {\'data\': \'<ns0:query> <ns0:querystring> SELECT Id, Name, ProductCode, Description FROM Product2 </ns0:querystring></ns0:query>\'}
